price: 38. All the bad aspects of these (the above mentioned things) are hateful to your Lord.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
